decisions: Follow protocol even if emotion fades
Avoid emotional re-triggering — re-read structured guides instead
Let past-self design lead present-self actions
insights: Emotions are inconsistent — systems preserve intention across states
Clarity may fade but memory + protocol protect momentum
You don't need to feel inspired to act — systems restore fire over time
actions_taken: Anchored fallback to Leap Year Protocol
notes: This log captures Ravi’s fallback system when emotional intensity fades after clarity spikes. It anchors present actions to past intent, trusts the protocol even when emotions are numb, and emphasizes checklist-following over rethinking. It is a resilience protocol for future self.
